page.title: 11FARMING THROUGH THE YEAR
page.content: January-This month is spent clearing out the cattle pens.He repairs the machinery and other items.The stock is fed inside the barns. February-He prepares for lambing,which means he shears the sheep and makes pens inside the barn.He repairs fences and gates. March-The lambs now arive and will continue for the rest of the month. when they are stronger they go out into the fields.He sows spring cereals April-He rolls the winter cereals and uses fertiliser he sprays to kill off the weeds.He fertiliser the grass ready for silage.May.He should be silage making by cutting and collecting from the fields.This takes 6-8 weeks.He puts it in heaps for the following winter.
